TopicTitle: How do I duplicate a part in VAB?

Articles.Content:
I'm making a KSS and I need help for the solar panels part because I need to duplicate the truss part (that contains a solar panel) for my station, and duplicate THAT for the other side.

What is the Windows shortcut for duplicating a single part (and all stuff connected to it) in the VAB?

Edited January 1, 2014 by Kerbiter

you need to press Alt+LMB to create an exact copy of a part, and all parts that are attached to it.

http://wiki.kerbalspaceprogram.com/wiki/Controls

Edited January 1, 2014 by Taki117
Added link

you need to press Alt+LMB to create an exact copy of a part, and all parts that are attached to it.

Thanks for answering VERY quickly.
